name: Apolune
description: Apolune is a minimalist, endless procedural evolutionary space war. Enjoy fighting wave after wave of enemy starships in a classic "2D" simulation that evolves and mutates as you fight on, victorious. Defend the Earth from hordes of vile aliens in your simple craft: point-and-shoot.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or Greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL Storage: 1300 MB available space Sound Card: Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 or i7 Series Graphics: NVIDIA Storage: 1300 MB available space Sound Card: Required
